attack.name: Burning Tail
attack.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Charizard.

pokepower.name: Snow Gift
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you play Froslass from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Ground Frost
attack.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Fire Fang
attack.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attack.name: Magma Mantle
attack.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. This attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each {R} or {S} Energy card you discarded

attack.name: Primal Scythe
attack.text: You may discard Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, or Old Amber from your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage.

attack.name: Rock Slide
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Flash
attack.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Gadget Bold
attack.text: If Luxray has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, you may do 100 damage instead of 60 to the Defending Pokémon. If you do, discard that Pokémon Tool card.

attack.name: Cloak Party
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Burmy and Wormadam, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Energy Assist
attack.text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

pokebody.name: Competitiveness
pokebody.text: If you don't have a Supporter card in play, each of Probopass's attacks does 30 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Top Chop
attack.text: Draw a card.

attack.name: Tumbling Attack
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

pokepower.name: Top Accelerator
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a basic Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If that card isn't a basic Energy card, discard it. This power can't be used if Salamence is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Shoot Trough
attack.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Damage Roller
attack.text: Put damage counters on the Defending Pokémon until the Defending Pokémon has the same remaining HP as Swalot. (If the Defending Pokémon has the same or less remaining HP as Swalot, this attack does nothing.)

attack.name: Entangle Tackle
attack.text: You may do 50 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your Pokémon, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

attack.name: Leaf Guard
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Tangrowth by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Swallow Up
attack.text: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokémon and Tangrowth. If the Defending Pokémon has fewer remaining HP than Tangrowth's, this attack does 120 damage instead.

attack.name: Corner
attack.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Convert Blow
attack.text: If Toxicroak has any {P} Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If Toxicroak has any {F} Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

attack.name: Charge Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Zapdos G

attack.name: Lightning Strike
attack.text: You may discard all {L} Energy attached to Zapdos G. If you do, this attack's base damage is 80 instead of 40.

pokepower.name: Unearth
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may search your deck for Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, or Old Amber, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This Power can't be used if Aerodactyl is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Hyper Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attack.name: Oracle Arrow
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Antigravity
attack.text: The Retreat Cost for Bronzong is 0 until the end of your next turn.

pokebody.name: Cloudy Sky
pokebody.text: If any of your {G} Pokémon or {R} Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, reduce that damage by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Worry Seed
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

pokepower.name: Curse
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. This Power can't be used if Gengar is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Shadow Skip
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) You may switch Gengar with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attack.name: Sharpshooting
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Poison Jab
attack.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Wreck
attack.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage. Discard that Stadium card.

attack.name: Avalanche
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attack.name: Tumble Down
attack.text: Discard as many {F} Energy cards as you like from your hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of {F} Energy cards you discarded.

attack.name: Rock Tumble
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attack.name: Push Out
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attack.name: Vortex Chop
attack.text: If the Defending Pokémon has any Resistance, this attack's base damage is 120 instead of 60.

pokepower.name: Relaxing Shower
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard an Energy card from your hand. If you do, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. This Power can’t be used if Lopunny is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Hover Heal
attack.text: Remove all Special Conditions from Lopunny.

attack.name: Second Bite
attack.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

attack.name: Swift
attack.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attack.name: Time Spiral
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Evolved Pokémon. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon and have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attack.name: Primal Tentacles
attack.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Helix Fossil, Dome Fossil, and Old Amber in your discard pile.

attack.name: Water Pulse
attack.text: The defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Continuous Crush
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attack.name: Baby Steps
attack.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
